I would give this 5 stars because as someone else said it feels like suede and I am OBSESSED! However, I bought the beige one first. Loved it and then bought the mint one a few days later. Same size (Large) different fit. The beige was longer not only in the sleeves but in the torso and it was made a bit wider. The mint one still fits but the sleeve isn’t longer like I enjoy. I also really enjoyed the length and slightly looser fit of the beige as I’m in a weight loss journey and self conscious of my stomach where all my weight is.  Debating on keeping the mint one but in fear of ordering a size up and it’s too big  Pictures for comparison

This is a nice sweater. However it fits snug. I ordered the XL based on previous reviews stating you could down a size. I normally wear XXL but even in this sweater I don’t think the XXL would suffice. It  has a lot of Lycra in it which makes for a snug fit. The material is not forgiving at all. It’s a medium weighted sweater. So if you wore it on slightly cool days you would not need a jacket. I am returning the sweater and am afraid to try the XXL due to the Lycra .

Buyer be aware!  These are really cute sweaters, as I tried one in brown and loved it so I ordered more in all different colors. When they arrived I hung them up and when I finally wore two of them (the red and the cream colors) I noticed there are defects in the sown pattern on the back of the shoulder. Same defect on both red and cream color sweater. I also got a black one and green one which did not have the defect. Overall very cute but some are defective. Double check when you receive the item that it is in good condition instead of being an idiot like me who assumed it was all fine.
